segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen and feeling a strange mix of amusement and alarm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the water just cascades from the sink is strangely mesmerizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I remember the potential damage, and my amusement fades.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children! They're so brazen in their cookie quest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's moments away from giving way beneath the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly bothers me to see such a clear and present danger go unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl's expectant face is almost too innocent for this risky venture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself hoping someone will intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's serene focus on her dishwashing is almost infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she sense the collective energy of mischief and peril behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I guess some people can just block out the world when they're concentrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this goes beyond normal concentration; it borders on negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR
